short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See your most used Slack emoji of the year!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Emoji Wrapped Chrome Extension allows you to view statistics about your top used emoji of the year! Just install the extension, visit your Slack team's Customize Workspace page, and generate a report.

**⚠️ Note**: Due to API limitations, generating a report for a larger enterprise or workspace may be slow!
